title: If downsizing by 101.3 caused the lay-off of Brian the Stuntboy, then how come they have hired a new morning DJ to work with Linda?
text:
This question really should be addressed to the station. The original
question has been one of our most popular in regards to comments, and
we encourage Stuntboy fans to direct all of those comments and
concerns to the station itself. Station management really aren't
under any obligation to tell us about their hiring practices, but
would be more open to hearing comments from listeners. Thanks!
